overview: The world is dominated by Publiceptor. Known as Algo, he models everyone's reality by shaping history at their own pace. The algorithm of large companies, like Gugle's, evolves under his control. Until then his only opponent was Jean-Charles, another reality modeler who gave birth to the 420 crew, a group of weed-smoking Santa Claus who hate the Youtube system. But Algo eliminated him and now the creations of the deposed Jean-Charles are directed by Gugle.  Under the direction of Wax_5, an android with overdeveloped intelligence, he is hatching at Gugle a plan to lobotomize the masses. Pianitza, a former disciple of the 420, is part of the plan. But his brother TzaTza, a disciple of Algo, came to free him from the clutches of the system to reverse the trend ...
title: 420 The Movie
